pr_title: SONARJAVA-3546 Issue message of S5961 should contains the number of actual assertions

timeline.bodyText:
Woa, I think we need to reformulate this. What about something simpler:
Refactor this method to reduce the number of assertions from 3 to less than 2.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

replies.bodyText: Yea, I tried to imitates other rules messages, but in the end, they all have a different one, and this one looks good.
replies.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
